update.Python\u3067TwitterAPI\u3092\u53e9\u304f\u306b\u306fTweepy\u304c\u4fbf\u5229\nTweepy\u516c\u5f0f\nGithub\n\u307b\u307c\u5168\u3066\uff08\u591a\u5206\u5168\u90e8\uff1f\uff09\u306eAPI\u3092\u30b5\u30dd\u30fc\u30c8\u3057\u3066\u308b\u304b\u3089\u4f55\u3067\u3082\u53e9\u3051\u308b\u3002\nConsumer key\u3084Access token\u306b\u3064\u3044\u3066\u306f\u3053\u3053\u304c\u8a73\u3057\u3044\u304b\u3082\u3002\n\n\u4f8b\n\u3042\u308b\u30e6\u30fc\u30b6\u306e\u30d5\u30a9\u30ed\u30ef\u30fc\u306eID\u3092\u53d6\u3063\u3066\u304f\u308b\n\napi_test.py\nimport sys\nimport tweepy\n\nconsumer_key = sys.argv[1]\nconsumer_secret = sys.argv[2]\naccess_token = sys.argv[3]\naccess_token_secret = sys.argv[4]\n\nauth = tweepy.OAuthHandler(consumer_key, consumer_secret)\nauth.set_access_token(access_token, access_token_secret)\n\napi = tweepy.API(auth)\n\nprint api.followers_ids('yamaguchiyuto')\n\n\n$ python api_test.py [consumer key] [consumer key\u3084Access token\u306b\u3064\u3044\u3066\u306f[\u3053\u3053](http://webgaku.hateblo.jp/entry/2014/04/11/200523)\u304c\u8a73\u3057\u3044\u304b\u3082\u3002\n\n##\u4f8b\n\n\u3042\u308b\u30e6\u30fc\u30b6\u306e\u30d5\u30a9\u30ed\u30ef\u30fc\u306eID\u3092\u53d6\u3063\u3066\u304f\u308b\n\n```api_test.py\nimport sys\nimport tweepy\n\nconsumer_key = sys.argv[1]\nconsumer_secret = sys.argv[2]\naccess_token = sys.argv[3]\naccess_token_secret = sys.argv[4]\n\nauth = tweepy.OAuthHandler(consumer_key, consumer_secret)\nauth.set_access_token(access_token, access_token_secret)\n\napi = tweepy.API(auth)\n\nprint api.followers_ids('yamaguchiyuto')\n```\n\n```\n$ python api_test.py [consumer key]
